data.question: What is the empirical formula of MC4•NaClO4?
What is the crystal system and space group of MC4•NaI?
What is the final R indices for MC4•NaClO4 [I > 2σ(I)]?
What method was used for absorption correction in the X-Ray Diffraction Data Analysis of MC4•NaI?
What is the calculated density of MC4•NaClO4?
What is the cooperativity of NaClO4 binding to MC5 in the gas phase?
Is the cooperativity of NaI binding stronger or weaker than NaClO4 binding in MC5 according to computational results?
What discrepancy was observed between computational and experimental results regarding NaClO4 binding in MC5?
data.answer: Computational results overestimated the cooperativity of NaClO4 binding compared to experimental results.

data.question: What was the issue with the optimized structure of MC5•NaClO4 in the computational study?
data.answer: The ClO4− anion is fixed at a specific orientation, which does not mimic the tumbling observed experimentally.

data.question: What additional site does MC4 provide for Na+ binding in solution phase?
data.answer: An extracavity Na+ binding site provided by the amide carbonyl groups.
